biography: Von Hertzen Brothers is a Finnish progressive rock band. It consists of three brothers Kie, Mikko and Jonne von Hertzen. On their album Love Remains the Same (2008), Mikko Kaakkurinniemi (drums, percussion) and Juha Kuoppala (piano, keyboards) are listed as part of Von Hertzen Brothers.  Their debut album Experience was released in 2001 and re-released in 2006. In 2006, they released their second album titled Approach. Their third album, Love Remains the Same, came out on the 14th of May 2008 and went straight to #1 on the official Finnish album charts. Their next album Stars Aligned  was released on 23. March 2011.  Their 5th album Nine Lives was released on March 21st 2013 with an official video for the single "Flowers And Rust"  Official site: www.VonHertzenBrothers.com
name: Von Hertzen Brothers

discogs.name: Von Hertzen Brothers
discogs.profile:
Finnish alternative/prog rock band formed in 2000.
The group originally consisted only of the three Von Hertzen brothers and a varying cast of guest musicians, but added Mikko Kaakkuriniemi (drums) and Juha Kuoppala (keyboards) as full-time members in 2006. They were later replaced by Sami Kuoppamäki and Robert Engstrand in 2016 and 2018, respectively.

theaudiodb.biography_en: Von Hertzen Brothers is a Finnish progressive rock band. It consists of three brothers Kie, Mikko and Jonne von Hertzen. On their album Love Remains the Same (2008), Mikko Kaakkurinniemi (drums, percussion) and Juha Kuoppala (piano, keyboards) are listed as part of Von Hertzen Brothers.  Their debut album Experience was released in 2001 and re-released in 2006. In 2006, they released their second album titled Approach. Their third album, Love Remains the Same, came out on the 14th of May 2008 and went straight to #1 on the official Finnish album charts. Their next album Stars Aligned  was released on 23. March 2011.  Their 5th album Nine Lives was released on March 21st 2013 with an official video for the single "Flowers And Rust"  Official site: www.VonHertzenBrothers.com
theaudiodb.name: Von Hertzen Brothers

discogs.name: Von Hertzen Brothers
discogs.profile:
Finnish alternative/prog rock band formed in 2000.
The group originally consisted only of the three Von Hertzen brothers and a varying cast of guest musicians, but added Mikko Kaakkuriniemi (drums) and Juha Kuoppala (keyboards) as full-time members in 2006. They were later replaced by Sami Kuoppamäki and Robert Engstrand in 2016 and 2018, respectively.

They were later replaced by Sami Kuoppamäki and Robert Engstrand in 2016 and 2018, respectively.
